When the first Ninjago 2022 set names were revealed,I thought this would dragon would be like firstbourne ( fb) in terms of size. I was wrong. Like REALLY Wrong. This set is WORSE than the Kai'
column3: Dragon EVO. Ok,let me tell you why.

column1: The dragons wings are HORRIBLE. The wings are tiny and made out of plastic. The head is great,however.The tail is too tiny and the body looks weird. Anyway-
DO not buy this set UNLESS you are 4+ or something. Because it is BAD.
But,i do not like criticising sets too much,so i'
